root: ^You're playing Love & Other Monsters. Or... what will become Love & Other Monsters.
^This is a quick little test to see how my expressions will work in-game. Fun, right?
^So, what do you think? Am I... "expressive"?

c-0: ^Why, thank you! Our art and programming teams worked really hard to bring me to life!
^You're sweet. I think you'll fit in just fine in Castelonia...
c-1: ^Really? Don't even have the guts to tell me you don't like me, huh?
c-2: ^You don't look good at all, to be honest...
^I'm so glad you made it here today with that visual impairment you must have!
